short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract open data from *.waylight.me `/me` endpoint while its active tab. Easy-copy fields:userid,expertid,headers cookies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Expose Waylight /me Endpoint
Discover and extract essential user data effortlessly with the Waylight /me Endpoint Extractor!

This lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension is designed specifically for developers of the Waylight platform. It enables you to access and copy open data directly from the /me endpoint on the active tab. Key features include:

Instant Data Retrieval: Easily extract your User ID, Expert ID, and Cookies while browsing Waylight.
Streamlined Copy Functionality: One-click buttons let you copy data for quick use.
Secure & Targeted: Works exclusively on Waylight’s domain (*.waylight.me), ensuring focus and privacy.
Whether you’re a Waylight enthusiast, developer, or power user, this tool simplifies access to open data you need—without hassle. Install now to enhance your Waylight browsing experience!
